SEARCH
Module com.example.sesion4
Package com.example.sesion4.controller

Class GameVController

java.lang.Object
com.example.sesion4.controller.GameVController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameController
public class GameVController extends Object implements Serializable
Main game controller that manages player grid interactions and game state. Handles ship drawing, enemy shots processing, and game state persistence. Implements Serializable to support game saving functionality.
See Also:
